lead_paragraph: Ales Kotalik scored a power-play goal with four seconds left in overtime last night to give the Buffalo Sabres a 5-4 victory against the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs. Kotalik’s slap shot from the left circle was stopped by goalie Andrew Raycroft, but Toronto defenseman Bryan McCabe inadvertently knocked the puck into his own net to give the Sabres the dramatic victory.
